column1: # ZAP 規則設定（由 Cloudflare 在 Edge 設定安全標頭）

column3: Incomplete or No Cache-control Header Set - Managed by Cloudflare (cache-control: max-age=600)
Web Browser XSS Protection Not Enabled - Mitigated by CSP set via Cloudflare
X-Frame-Options Header Not Set - Set via Cloudflare (X-Frame-Options: DENY)
X-Content-Type-Options Header Missing - Set via Cloudflare (X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff)
Information Disclosure - Suspicious Comments - False positives from Angular Material minified method names (e.g. _isAttachedToDom)
Strict-Transport-Security Header Not Set - Set via Cloudflare (max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload)
Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set - Set via Cloudflare with frame-ancestors 'none'
Storable and Cacheable Content / Non-Storable Content - Static assets use content-hash filenames for cache busting; cache-control managed by Cloudflare
Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy Header Missing - Set via Cloudflare (same-origin)
Dangerous JS Functions - setTimeout/setInterval in Angular/RxJS framework internals, not application code; eval/new Function blocked by eslint.configs.recommended (no-eval, no-implied-eval)
